## Statement interface

Shape of each statement passed to the logger.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Statement 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [message](./tags-logger.statement.message.md) |  | string | One or more sentences that we are interesting in logging. |
|  [tags](./tags-logger.statement.tags.md) |  | string\[\] | An array of tags this log statement is related to. The tags array should contain a \*\*single\*\* word describing the severity level (\*e.g.\* <code>'debug'</code>, <code>'info'</code>), and \*\*at least\*\* tag describing what the log statement is related to. |
